solution_line_template: The second present needs {second_present_fraction_numerator} / {second_present_fraction_denominator} * {first_present} = {second_present} square feet of wrapping paper.
The third present needs {first_present} + {second_present} = {third_present} square feet of wrapping paper.
Therefore, Carrie needs {first_present} + {second_present} + {third_present} = {total_wrapping_paper} square feet of wrapping paper for all three presents.
